entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:57 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 12:57 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
